DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
This Spell is #yIce elemental, #yBlazed enemies will take extra damage from it.
Frozen cards are removed from play until end of combat.
When playing an electrified card, lose #r3 HP.
This card has a chance of applying Shocked to enemies.
The effects of this card will occur at the start of your turn, after an amount of turns equal to the card's #yCast #yTime has passed.
Reduce the casting time of your #ySpells for each stack of #yShortened #yChant
Multiple copies of the same spell will only count as one unique spell.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
